scripts.build:static: node --input-type module --eval "import {cp} from 'node:fs/promises'; await cp('static', 'dist', {recursive: true})"
scripts.generate: fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style normal --weight 700 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-Bold.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style italic --weight 700 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-BoldItalic.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style italic --weight 400 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-Italic.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style normal --weight 500 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-Medium.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style italic --weight 400 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-Italic.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style italic --weight 500 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-MediumItalic.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style normal --weight 600 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-SemiBold.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style normal --weight 400 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-Regular.woff2 && fontpie --fallback sans-serif --style italic --weight 600 --name 'Open Sans' static/OpenSans-SemiBoldItalic.woff2 && fontpie --fallback mono --style normal --weight 700 --name 'Ubuntu' static/UbuntuMono-Bold.woff2 && fontpie --fallback mono --style italic --weight 400 --name 'Ubuntu' static/UbuntuMono-Italic.woff2 && fontpie --fallback mono --style normal --weight 400 --name 'Ubuntu' static/UbuntuMono-Regular.woff2
